mapper.select: select s.status from shipping as s left join menu as m on s.menu_id = m.id where m.seller_id = #{seller_id};

select t2.*, t1.amount from orderDetail t1 right join ( select s.*, m.img1 from shipping as s left join menu as m on s.menu_id = m.id where m.seller_id = #{seller_id}) t2 on t1.order_id = t2.order_id and t1.menu_id = t2.menu_id;

select t2.*, t1.amount from orderDetail t1 right join ( select s.*, m.img1 from shipping as s left join menu as m on s.menu_id = m.id where s.member_id = #{member_id} and order_id = #{order_id}) t2 on t1.order_id = t2.order_id and t1.menu_id = t2.menu_id;
